`{ReLTER}` is an R package that allows interact with software (e.g. [DEIMS-SDR](https://deims.org/)) implemented by eLTER Research Infrastructure (RI) and manage the data/information shared by them.

<!-- about the icons https://github.com/ikatyang/emoji-cheat-sheet -->

## :book: Documentation

You can visit `{ReLTER}` website at [oggioniale.github.io/ReLTER/](https://oggioniale.github.io/ReLTER/) for obtain more information, documentation and examples of use.  


## :arrow_double_down: Installation

You can install the development version of `{ReLTER}` from [GitHub](https://github.com/oggioniale/ReLTER) with:

```{r, installationInfo, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("oggioniale/ReLTER")
```


## :memo: Examples

Some examples of the possible capabilities of this library is given below. In these examples you can see the interaction, througth [API](https://deims.org/api), with [DEIMS-SDR](https://deims.org/).

The *getSiteBoundaries* function creates a map overlaying the boundaries of the site (e.g. Lake Maggiore) thanks to the information on geographical aspects provided by [DEIMS-SDR](https://deims.org/).

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, exampleSiteBoundaries}
library(dplyr)
siteBoundaries <- ReLTER::getSiteBoundaries(deimsid = 'https://deims.org/f30007c4-8a6e-4f11-ab87-569db54638fe')
leaflet::leaflet(siteBoundaries) %>% 
  leaflet::addTiles() %>% 
  leaflet::addPolygons()
siteBoundaries
```

--------------------------------

The *getNetworkParameters* function creates a list of parameters collected by a network (e.g. LTER-Italy). Information always gathered from what is indicated in the different sites on [DEIMS-SDR](https://deims.org/).

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, exampleSiteParameters}
library(dplyr)
invisible(
  utils::capture.output(
    listParams <- ReLTER::getNetworkParameters(
      networkDEIMSID = 'https://deims.org/network/7fef6b73-e5cb-4cd2-b438-ed32eb1504b3'
    )
  )
)
knitr::kable(listParams[1:10, ] %>% dplyr::rows_insert(tibble(parameterLabel = "...", parameterUri = "...")))
```

--------------------------------

The *getDataset* function provides to a table with information about specific dataset shared through [DEIMS-SDR](https://deims.org/).

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, exampleGetDataset}
tDataset <- ReLTER::getDataset(datasetid = "https://deims.org/dataset/38d604ef-decb-4d67-8ac3-cc843d10d3ef")
leaflet::leaflet(tDataset) %>% 
  leaflet::addTiles() %>% 
  leaflet::addPolygons()
tDataset
```

--------------------------------

The *getSiteRelatedResources* function provides a list of related resources associated with a site within [DEIMS-SDR](https://deims.org/).

```{r, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, exampleGetSiteRelatedResources}
tSiteRelatedResources <- ReLTER::getSiteRelatedResources(
  deimsid = "https://deims.org/f30007c4-8a6e-4f11-ab87-569db54638fe"
)
tSiteRelatedResources$relatedResources[[1]]
```

--------------------------------

The *parametersChartWaffle* function provides a grouping of parameters, declared as measured within a site, in a waffle chart representation.

```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, exampleparametersChartWaffle}
ReLTER::parametersChartWaffle(
  deimsid = "https://deims.org/f30007c4-8a6e-4f11-ab87-569db54638fe"
)
```
